headline: Is AppLovin (APP) Stock a Bargain Buy After Its 50% Plunge?
summary: AppLovin Corp (APP) is currently one of the highest-momentum tech stocks on the market and, understandably, has elevated implied volatility to match. APP shareholders were getting giddy after a mesmeric rise from ~$50 to over $500 per share. However, the stock has plunged 50% since its February peak and now trades around $250 per share. Despite the substantial valuation risks, volatility, and recent price plunge, I’m tentatively bullish about APP’s chances of generating shareholder returns over

headline: AppLovin Corporation (APP) Is a Trending Stock: Facts to Know Before Betting on It
summary: Recently, Zacks.com users have been paying close attention to AppLovin (APP). This makes it worthwhile to examine what the stock has in store.

headline: The Top Nasdaq-100 Stock in 2025 Has Nothing to Do With Artificial Intelligence (AI)
summary: In 2024, technology stocks involved in artificial intelligence (AI) led the Nasdaq-100 index higher, while healthcare stocks struggled due in part to concerns about how Robert F. Kennedy's nomination for Health and Human Services Secretary might impact the industry.  AppLovin (NASDAQ: APP) advanced 713%.  Palantir Technologies (NASDAQ: PLTR) advanced 340%.

headline: AppLovin: Now It's Time To Jump In (Rating Upgrade)
summary: AppLovin reached a sales volume of ~$1.37B (+44% YoY) with a remarkable 78% YoY increase in adj. EBITDA to $848M. See why I upgrade APP stock from hold to buy.

headline: INVESTIGATION NOTICE: Girard Sharp Law Firm Encourages AppLovin (NASDAQ
summary: SAN FRANCISCO, March 11, 2025 -- Girard Sharp, LLP, a national investment, securities, and consumer class action firm, is investigating potential securities claims on behalf of AppLovin ...
